sentence.Network_en: A patch of red cloudburst over the horizon , blood - red, and glowing.
sentence.Network_cn: 天边绽出一小片红霞,血红、发亮.

sentence.Network_en: A black cloudburst was drenching Siena at midday.
sentence.Network_cn: 中午,一场天昏地暗的暴风雨在锡耶纳上空倒下来.

sentence.Network_en: All of a sudden a storm broke – a cloudburst.
sentence.Network_cn: 突然暴风雨来临了—一场常见的大暴雨.

entry.def: A cloudburst is a sudden, very heavy fall of rain.
